over blocked arrays is an expensive operation that must be performed explicitly. If
is an int, it defines the number of equal-width bins in the given range (10, by default). If
is a sequence, it defines a monotonically increasing array of bin edges, including the rightmost edge, allowing for non-uniform bin widths.
